K10D0349_H0357:59b-0: dbang po rnams @59b bde bar snang na de ji

K10D0349_H0357:59b-3: gal te tshig thon na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur
K10D0349_H0357:59b-4: ro; ;ci tsam na gzhan zhig ltad mo skyes nas

K10D0349_H0357:59b-10: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid
K10D0349_H0357:59b-11: 'di ltar khri'i steng du 'dug cing sdug bsngal drag
K10D0349_H0357:59b-12: po'i tshor bas nyen pa bzhin du nye bar ston
K10D0349_H0357:59b-13: cing / de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-14: shi bi pa khyed ma 'jigs shig /
K10D0349_H0357:59b-15: bram ze nga yin srin bu bo min //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-16: sngon gyi las kyi nyes pa yis //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-18: 'di nyid du ni kun bshad na //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-22: chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar ni //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-23: 'di dag kun kyang bshad par bya //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-24: sngon gyi las kyi mtshan nyid ni //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-25: de ring nga la 'bras bcas gyur //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-26: yon tan kun gyis rnam mdzes la //
K10D0349_H0357:59b-27: zla ba lta bur zhi ba dang //

K10D0349_H0357:59b-30: rgya mtsho bzhin du zab gyur cing //

K10D0349_H0357:59b-33: chos kyi rgyal po gang na bzhugs //

K10D0349_H0357:60a-4: bdag nyid che de gang na bzhugs //
K10D0349_H0357:60a-6: shi bi pa rnams myur du smros //
K10D0349_H0357:60a-7: thugs rje can de ma gtogs par //
K10D0349_H0357:60a-8: gang la lus phyed su zhig ster //
K10D0349_H0357:60a-9: de ltar rgyal po'i lam nas snying rje ba dang /

K10D0349_H0357:60a-24: rgyal po dpal gyi sde byams pa'i bdag nyid can /

K10D0349_H0357:60b-11: btsun mo rgyal ba'i 'od dbugs phyung ngo //

K10D0349_H0357:60b-15: 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di phyogs thams cad du bas mun par gyur la /

K10D0349_H0357:61a-0: rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin dus la @61a *//
K10D0349_H0357:61a-2: ji lta 'jigs shing rtsub pa'i sgra kun grags pas na //

K10D0349_H0357:61a-9: sa la gnas pa'i chu rnams kyang ni bskams par gyur //
K10D0349_H0357:61a-10: rma bya rnams kyang nags kyis bcom bzhin sgra bsgrags te //
K10D0349_H0357:61a-11: mi rnams kyang ni 'khrug bcas khyim du rnam par rgyu //

K10D0349_H0357:61a-13: phyag dar dang 'dres rlung ni mkha' la rab tu lding //

K10D0349_H0357:61a-16: bkra mi shis pa'i mtshan ma ni //

K10D0349_H0357:61a-19: phyogs su 'gro ba shin tu rigs //

K10D0349_H0357:61a-23: brang aa ri shtha ga la ba der 'dung bar

K10D0349_H0357:62a-0: mi ni rked pa bcad pa 'tsho zhing sngon ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du tshig @62a *//
